Freshwater Atlas Collections

Source: R/collections.R, R/meta-collections.R
fwa_collections.Rd

Get information about the collections.

fwa_collections()

fwa_meta_collections()

Value

A tibble.

Functions

  • fwa_meta_collections: Freshwater Atlas Collections

See also

Other collections: fwa_collection_properties(), fwa_collection()

Examples

fwa_collections()
